item.title: BC-3 East at BC-93 South
item.description: BC-3 east at BC-93 south to US Border. Continue east on BC-3 for Fernie and Alberta Border. BC-93 south leaves BC-3 east here.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95 Junction
item.description: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95 Junction. Exit for BC-93/BC-95 north to Invermere and Radium Hot Springs. Continue straight for BC-3 East/BC-93 South to Fernie and Lethbridge (Alberta). BC-93 south joins BC-3 east to Elko.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95
item.description: Approaching BC-3 East/BC-95 North split in 1300 metres. BC-3 East joins BC-93 South to Fernie and Lethbridge (AB). BC-95/BC-93 north to Invermere and Radium Hot Springs.

item.title: BC-95/BC-93 North at BC-95A
item.description: BC-93/BC-95 north to Radium, Golden, and Invermere, at BC-95A south to Kimberley.

item.title: BC-95/BC-93 North at BC-95A
item.description: BC-93/BC-95 approaching BC-95A. Turn right for BC-93/BC-95 north.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-93/BC-95
item.description: Approaching BC-3 East/BC-95 North split in 1300 metres. BC-3 East joins BC-93 South to Fernie and Lethbridge (AB). BC-95/BC-93 north to Invermere and Radium.

item.title: BC-3 East/BC-95 North at BC-95A
item.description: BC-3/BC-95 west to Fernie and Radium Hot Springs at BC-95A to Kimberley.

item.title: BC-3 East BC-93 South Jct.
item.description: BC-3 east at BC-93 south to US Border

item.title: BC-3 East BC-93 South Jct.
item.description: Closeup of BC-3 (Crowsnest Hwy)/BC-93 shields on BC-3 east

item.title: BC-3 West BC-93 South Jct.
item.description: BC-93 south to Roosville and US Border on BC-3 west

item.title: Distance Marker on BC-93 South
item.description: Distance marker to Roosville and US Border on BC-93 south

item.title: Distance Marker on BC-93 South
item.description: Distance marker to Eureka, Montana on BC-93 south

item.title: Welcome To British Columbia, BC-93 North
item.description: Welcome to British Columbia on BC-93 north

item.title: Welcome To British Columbia, BC-93 North
item.description: Super natural British Columbia Welcomes You on BC-93 north
